Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is partially grooved, covered with a red-brown slip and remains of seven lines of black-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393838) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393838)
